name: Hangar
tagline: WE ARE HERE TO TAKE YOU TO YOUR DESTINATION
description: Hangar Chile is a comprehensive creative agency , offering advertising and mass marketing / digital services. Founded in 1995, Hangar is a member of ICAN (Independent Communications Agencies Network) and The Network One. Hangar Chile specializes in the development of comprehensive strategic planning, commercial creativity, brand experience, design, program, social media, and trend analysis.
